updateData.functionBody:
//here we multiply each element of staticValue by 2
return staticValue.map( element => 2 * element );
updateData.description:
This table has a formula, which creates a new array with each value in the array "plainValue" multiplied by 2.

Changing the data in "plainValue" will automatically change this table.

This table uses a formula, like the table
"derivedValue", but this one uses "private"
code, which is accessible from the view dropdown
in the top right corner.

updateData.data:
Simple Tables and Functions

In this example we show a data table
with a static value and a few data 
tables that get their value from it,
using a formula, which includes
functions we define different ways.

Note tThe "Data View" dropdown in the upper
right of each table lets you look at
the data, code and other content
for the given table.

updateData.description: This is a plain JSON value  for a table.
